metadata.description:
An untold tale of the Six! Since the very first issue of The Sixth Gun,
readers have clamored for more information about General Hume's
horsemen. And now the story can be told. What happened to the
horsemen after their master died? This issue, "Bloodthirsty" Bill Sumter
finds himself alone, on the brink of death, and undergoing a frightening
transformation.
metadata.name: The Sixth Gun: Sons of the Gun
